issue.title: collider.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://collider.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcollider.com%2F) ### Comment Username: @troymcd > Web site detects AdGuard and will not display content. this blocker looks almost identical to one I reported yesterday on cbr.com. the filter has already been updated and cbr.com now works, but collider.com still does not. I have double checked all the settings both on this tablet and my phone with the same result. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ea313jjpmd4wkskwk4g44okcsow4s043b4f6nom6x4.jpg?nc=1)

issue.title: rocketnews24.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://rocketnews24.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Frocketnews24.com%2F) ### Comment Username: @ja1hss > 画像が表示されず空白となる。 > duckduckgoなど他のブラウザだと空白ではなく「広告ブロックをオフにしてください」などと表示されることもある。 > firefoxにuBOを利用すると画像が表示される。 > 広告ブロックを全部オフにしても画像が出ないことが多く、原因がよくわからない。 ### Screenshots

issue.title: www.youtube.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Up06CryWQpE](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DUp06CryWQpE) ### Comment Username: @Grandpat-Star > When I try to watch the official music video for Strawberry Wine by Deana Carter Official the adblock has not worked since last night. I have tried reloading and ads show up. When I have tried reloading other videos such as Introducing LEGO Braille Bricks – Play with Braille by Lego official, and the official audio for The Wrong Girl (Greatest Hits Version) by Lee Ann Womack Official the ads are not there. This seems to be contained to this specific video. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ghclp6szi9s0c8woscogs0w80og0ggsds7aguah22o.png?nc=1)

AdGuard Base

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion Other extensions used: | Duck Duck Go Privacy Essentials, Return Youtube Disklike Button, Youtube-shorts block, CustomTube, and Replace Youtube's Home with Subscriptions
